resources.string: Atopic dermatitis is a chronic inflammatory disease of the skin
Lupus is an autoimmune disease, in which the proper functioning of the immune system is disrupted
Pityriasis Rosea is caused by an unknown cause
Psoriasis is a skin disease caused due to chronic inflammation
Urticaria can be caused by allergies, for example to food, medicine, plants, animals.\nIn rare cases it is a symptom of a serious illness
The app serves as an initial response \nand is not a substitute for a medical diagnosis
SRD diagnoses skin rash and classifies it either as life-threatening problem that requires immediate referral for medical treatment or as a case requiring treatment but not urgently.
However, try to check the quality of the image taken
The app is under development and it is possible that the type of rash is not yet identified

You have 2 options to choose from:

 -Take a picture: 
 1. Hold the cell phone steady 
 10-15 cm away from target 
 2. Ensure good lighting 
 3. Ensure target is well focused 
 4. Tap to take a picture 
 5. Ensure the image quality is good 
 6. Confirm your choice 

 -Upload image:
 1. Select an image from the gallery 
 2. Ensure target is well focused 
 3. Ensure the image quality is good 

 Wait a few moments for a diagnosis
